attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that the Prime Minister and his Ministers have broken British Law that prohibits Parliament ceding powers or Sovereignty to a foreign regime and furtherto, broken European Treaty Law that states quite clearly that it requires all member Countries to vote in favour otherwise a Treaty cannot be enacted.

Given these facts, the Prime Minister and his Government have acted illegally and must either resign or restore the rule of Law and scrap the Lisbon Treaty with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
